General.Name: Barrick Gold Corp
General.Description: Barrick Gold Corporation engages in the exploration, mine development, production, and sale of gold and copper properties. The company also explores and sells silver and energy materials. It has ownership interests in producing gold mines located in Argentina, Canada, Côte d'Ivoire, the Democratic Republic of Congo, the Dominican Republic, Papua New Guinea, Tanzania, and the United States. The company also has ownership interests in producing copper mines located in Chile, Saudi Arabia, and Zambia; and various other projects located in the Americas, Asia, and Africa. Barrick Gold Corporation was founded in 1983 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: Brookfield Place, TD Canada Trust Tower, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2S1
